Package com.hfych2.brickdestroy.view

Class HomeMenu

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
com.hfych2.brickdestroy.view.HomeMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class HomeMenu
extends javax.swing.JPanel
HomeMenuController is extracted from this class of the original code.
This class has been modified along with having additions to become a view class.
This class is the view class for the controller HomeMenuController.
See Also:
